citeinfo.origin: University of Colorado, Boulder, Department of Aerospace Engineering Sciences, Colorado Center for Astrodynamics Research
citeinfo.title: CCAR Near Real-Time Altimetry Data

abstract.p: The Near Real-Time Altimetry data are provided by the Colorado Center for Astrodynamics Research (CCAR) at the University of Colorado, Boulder. Available data include near real-time SSH anomaly, near real-time geostrophic velocity viewer, alongtract altimetry viewer, alongtract altimetry ASCII host, and SSH/ocean color overaly in the regions: global, Bering Sea, Gulf of Alaska, Sea of Japan, and Sea of Okhotsk.
Send questions and comments to the CCAR Real-time Altimeter Data Research Group at real-time@ccar.colorado.edu.

descript.purpose: To provide near real-time altimetry data.

cntaddr.address: University of Colorado at Boulder 431 UCB
University of Colorado at Boulder 431 UCB

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
